department.dept_long_name: Committee on the Study of Religion

course.title: Introduction to the Hindu Traditions of India
course.meeting_text: M., W., at 10, and hour to be arranged.
course.description: An introduction to the many distinct yet interrelated religious traditions of South Asia that are often labeled "Hinduism." This course considers the ways in which Hindus from a variety of historical time periods, local traditions, and social backgrounds have attempted to make sense of their world and their lives within it.
course.notes: //Offered jointly with the Divinity School as 3404.
